title: Let's Get it On | Marvin Gaye | funk cover ft. Hunter Elizabeth
description:
Join the Vinyl Club on Patreon by June 30th to reserve your Stank Face vinyl. Stank Face is available exclusively to Vinyl Club members and includes your name on a special insert in the album! http://patreon.com/scarypockets

 Get tickets to see us on tour! https://www.scarypocketsfunk.com

A funk cover of Marvin Gaye's "Let's Get it On" by Scary Pockets & Hunter Elizabeth.

MUSICIAN CREDITS
Lead vocal: Hunter Elizabeth
Drums: Ryan James Carr
Bass: Nicole Row
Guitar: Jude Smith, Ryan Lerman
Keys: Jack Conte

AUDIO CREDITS
Recording Engineer: Caleb Parker
Mix/Master: Craig Polasko

VIDEO CREDITS
Director: Dom Fera
DP: Nate Cuboi
Set Designer: Katie Theel
Editor: Adam Kritzberg

Recorded Live at The Village in Los Angeles, CA.
